entry.string: You may choose either or both of the following linebreak transforms:
HTML module will provide smart linebreaks on content.
HTML module will do a simple transform of linebreaks to <br />
Simple transform of newlines to line breaks <br />
For these transforms to take effect, you must
to your article pubtypes or other content items.
NOTE: Do not hook the HTML module if you only want to allow HTML tags on your site. Installing the HTML module and setting the allowed tags is enough.
